typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		transaction_id as string,
		cust_id as integer,
		tran_date as string,
		prod_subcat_code as integer,
		prod_cat_code as string,
		Qty as integer,
		Rate as integer,
		Tax as double,
		total_amt as double,
		Store_type as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> source1
source1 sink(input(
		Transaction_key as integer,
		customer_Key as integer,
		customer_id as integer,
		transaction_id as string,
		tran_date as date,
		prod_subcat_code as integer,
		prod_cat_code as integer,
		Qty as integer,
		Rate as integer,
		Tax as decimal(12,9),
		total_amt as decimal(12,9),
		Store_type as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	staged: true,
	mapColumn(
		customer_id = cust_id,
		Transaction_key = cust_id,
		transaction_id,
		prod_subcat_code,
		prod_cat_code,
		Qty,
		Rate,
		Tax,
		total_amt,
		Store_type
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink1
